metadata.title: CVE-2020-18780 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Use After Free vulnerability in function new_Token in asm/preproc.c innasm 2.14.02 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted nasmcommand.

criterions.comment: nasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
